name: The Goldfish of Guidance
description:
The Goldfish of Guidance is a game about keeping 4 kingdoms in check. Each kingdom will take turns and then ask you for advice. This could be creating buildings or going to war! You must help keep each country as close to 25% power to maintain balance on your small island.

WASD to spin the camera

Weather and sound effects are from the ultra-dynamic sky from the epic marketplace. 

all other effects/artworks are original 

Made by 

Daniel Kershaw - Game Design/Code

 Faybia Jex-Rippon - 2D Imagery

Joe Hayman - 3D Models

 Cody Mason PixelCod - Gold Fish Model
